title: Sideshow Fables
description: Our debut issue is packed full of surprises. In this issue you'll find tales of disillusioned circus performers, a homicidal strongman, the offspring of sideshow freaks, renegade clowns, a one-man circus, a man's mysterious midnight rendezvous, unrequited love, crushed hope, insidious little people, shady ringleaders, and an outer space circus.
author: Richard   Thomas
